item.title: Simple Maths Algorithms
item.description: Safe average of two numbers? The obvious solution $(a + b) / 2$ This is correct but the danger lies in the overflow issues. Let’s assume the a and b are maximum Integer values available. This makes their sum to be over the capacity. Yielding the incorrect values. One could also cast to the more capable type (int -> long) but this is only move the problem a bit, doesn’t solve it.
